response.original_title: Acts of Comedy: Teenagers Are God's Revenge
response.overview: From the producers of Bananas comes, Acts of Comedy: Teenagers are God's Revenge. Acts of Comedy features the top names in Christian comedy sharing their hilarious insights on everything from parenting to the differences between men's and women's bicycles. Jeff Allen explains why teenagers are God's revenge on mankind. Mixing music and mirth, Taylor Mason serves up the world's funniest blues song, and Ron Pearson does his hilarious "juggling life" routine. The DVD also includes bonus interviews with each comedian sharing his personal views on faith and the power of laughter. Entertainment for the whole family.
response.title: Acts of Comedy: Teenagers Are God's Revenge
